lead_paragraph: The Swiss syndicate Alinghi announced yesterday that it would defend its America’s Cup trophy in Valencia, Spain, where it won the final last month. Alinghi’s owner, Ernesto Bertarelli, announced Team New Zealand as the fourth challenger accepted for the next race — after South Africa’s Shosholoza, Team Origin of Britain and Desafio Español from Spain, the challenger of record.
